ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 128 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) = 1,024 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 128 cores x 2 FP64/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 512 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 128 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 2,048 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 128 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 = 4,096 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (3600 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: AmpereOne 128-core ARM server processor. TSMC 5nm. Custom ARM Neoverse-based cores. Lower TDP than 192-core variant. Single-threaded cores (no SMT). 128-bit NEON SIMD.
